entries.content:
Starting SemantixLogoOrchestrator refactoring session with Moti. Current state: 284-line orchestrator with mixed responsibilities:
1. Lifecycle management (initialize, destroy)
2. Component initialization & DI
3. Grid size management
4. Animation controller registry
5. Animation lifecycle (start/stop/pause/resume)
6. Getters for all subsystems

Following our proven ultra-modular pattern from thinking-toggle (267→120 lines + 10 micro-components) and provider-manager (99→96 lines + 5 micro-components).
